QuestData.Title: Resurrecting the Recruits
QuestData.Description:
The souls of these recruits aren't strong enough tae resist the dark magic bein' practiced on this island.
Use Resurrect on the remains of these recruits. Beseech the Light tae give 'em another chance while their souls still linger.
I've been stranded on this island for years, watchin' these ogres get away with all of this.
It's time tae make a stand.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ye've got what it takes tae become a great priest one day.
Me? Oh, me body is long since decayed. But I can rest easy now that I know these ogres are going tae be stopped.
